title: Book Travel for an Overseas Assignment
description: A reporter is being sent overseas to cover a conflict and needs flights, a hotel, and a local fixer booked.

tasks.description: Search for and book a round-trip flight to the destination country.
Book a room at a hotel that is pre-vetted for security by the news organization.
tasks.expected_outcome: A secure hotel is booked for the duration of the assignment.

tasks.description: Contact a pre-approved local fixer/translator from the organization's contact list and arrange their services.
tasks.expected_outcome: A local fixer is hired for the assignment.
